questions: Can you elaborate on your experience in creating database objects such as Stored Procedures, Functions, Views, Indexes, and Joins to facilitate efficient data manipulation and data consistency?
How have you utilized Derived Tables, Sub-Queries, Set Operators, and Joins to write complex queries in SQL?
Can you share your experience with Temporary Objects in SQL, such as CTE, Temporary Table, and Table Variable?
How have you utilized SQL Profiler for debugging queries in your professional experience?
Explain your experience in creating and updating Clustered and Non-Clustered Indexes to enhance SQL Server performance
Can you discuss a specific project where you developed physical data models and created DDL scripts to create database schema and objects? What challenges did you face and how did you overcome them?

How did you use Joins and sub-Queries to simplify complex queries involving multiple tables in your projects? Can you provide an example of how you optimized procedures and triggers for production use?
What methodologies have you employed for disaster recovery procedures and policies for backup and recovery of databases in your projects?
How have you performed performance tuning in SQL Server using SQL Profiler and data loading techniques in your projects?

Can you walk us through your role as a Software Developer in the Workers Compensation Management project? How did you contribute to the design, development, and testing of the system, and what were the key outcomes of your involvement?
